EmailTemplate.name: Reminder Email - !@ILTA Webinar2
EmailTemplate.subject: Event Reminder: IntApp Webinar Login Information...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IntApp- Webinar Confirmation
Hi, Thanks for registering for the "Not @ILTA" Webinar Series. Today's topic is Integrating Elite 3E into Your Environment. It will start in half an hour, at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern (5pm BST) today. Video and audio access instructions are below:
Webinar Title: Integrating Elite 3E into Your Environment
Video:
Conference URL: https://www.livemeeting.com/cc/vcc/join?id=w8038485&role=attend&pw=A803848
Meeting ID: w8038485 Entry Code: A803848
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In
US/Canada: 888-417-8462 UK: 0-800-404-7656 Passcode: 8038485
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 5-10 minutes prior to the start time.
